website_summaries.verdict: Detox your body's largest organ via this mask's drying capabilities.
pros: We love the silicone applicator that's also easy to clean and reuse
Moisturizes skin while removing excess oil
Helps skin conditions such as psoriasis and eczema
cons: The texture is a bit sticky and may not appeal to all

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing skin refresher for both myself and my teen daughter
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing skin refresher for both myself and my teen daughter. I put it on a little thicker so it was a harder to rinse off. Nice ability to massage and left my face glowing and very moist and fresh. This was the best mask I have ever tried. I will use a moistened towel next time to loosen before rinsing like my daughter did as hers came off easier. I can’t wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Great Clay Mask
customer_reviews.text: This clay is very easy to apply and the applicator spatula is sturdy. I can tell a difference in my pores and skin texture after use. Love it
customer_reviews.author: april maynor

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to remove. It's a wash off mask that only requires about 10 minutes to clean your face. I see and feel a difference when the mask comes off though so I would definitely recommend. As far as scent, it really doesnt seem to have one. Super softer and super easy to removed.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have sensitive skin and I have to be careful with things that I use and this worked so good on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tashia byus

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who usually has issues with masks but this one she absolutely loves this. I can't buy enough for her take my advice buy this product you will not regret it.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Yay for a great face mask !
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS. My skin is soft and it evens out my skin tone it helps reduce my pores and I can just tell the difference in my skin because it really does make my skin healthier and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Arlette

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Cosmetaspa has developed a wonderful Dead Sea Mud Mask for a really great price. Goes on a little thick, but dries efficiently, and has easy removal. Will consider shopping again!
customer_reviews.author: Salon Amfora

customer_reviews.title: The mask works great and leaves my skin feeling great
customer_reviews.text: The mask works great and leaves my skin feeling great. The only issue I’ve had is the applicator fell apart the first time I used it so I recommend having a spare handy or using a finger.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It has a very subtle clean smell, which I love. I use it a couple times a week and my skin feels so soft
customer_reviews.author: Halie L Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice from what I could tell but my skin is to sensitive for it so I can’t really use it now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing exciting
customer_reviews.text: Left skin smoothed but nothing major, I would say results were neutral. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gbela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works super well. Stings a little but means its cleaning well. works well on all skins types.
customer_reviews.author: elena stonehouse

customer_reviews.title: Wont leave skin dry
customer_reviews.text: Face feels smooth and clean. Good for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Merlen V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great !!! The applicator is extremely helpful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Mask is okay..
customer_reviews.text: The product feels and smells like I'm putting inexpensive play-doh on my face and doesn't do much for my skin. The brush it comes with works great and I use this for all of my other masks now so I don't waste extra product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for sensitive skin. This dried ky face out really bad. I will admit the applicator itself is good for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a nice box. Easy to use and works well with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It hurts my skin. I tried it a few time but ever time has been painful. No improvement to my skin after I've endured it either. I also have to scrub hard because it feels oily after I wash it off then leaves my skin dry.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Christian

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on the skin and leaves a rejuvenated look!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on the skin and leaves a rejuvenated look! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Trez GeeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mask it worked so well . Made my skin so smooth
customer_reviews.author: Theodolinda Chambers

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It left my skin feeling soft and smooth, moisturized too.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

product_meta.title: Activated Charcoal Mud Mask with- Premium, Silicone Mask Brush, 8.8 oz Fights Acne, Blackhead Remover and Pore Refining Mask for Detoxing and Cleansing :: Paraben and Sulfate Free by Cosmetasa
feature_bullets: STRUGGLING WITH ACNE, BLACKHEADS, PIMPLES OR OILY SKIN? Cosmetasa's Activated Charcoal Mud Mask will draw out toxins and impurities of your skin thereby cleansing and minimizing the pores greatly.

UNIQUE BLEND OF SELECT INGREDIENTS: Our superior Activated Charcoal Mud Mask Clay is formulated with other highly beneficial ingredients such as aloe leaf juice, olive oil, hyaluronic acid and jojoba oil which greatly promote detoxing, moisturizing and purification of skin.

CONVENIENT BONUS BRUSH: No need to use your fingers — your mud mask comes with our top-rated sleek, fan-shaped brush that's custom-made for mud application and helps you apply the product evenly over your face. Using this mask applicator will help you apply the mud mask smoothly and evenly thereby wasting less of the product!
BENEFITS MALE, FEMALE, TEEN OR ADULTS: Cosmetasa's Charcoal mud mask is gentle yet effective enough for face & body deep cleansing . Its spa quality formula is ideal for all skin types.
NATURAL PARABEN, SULFATE AND CRUELTY FREE- 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed! 3 year company warranty! Contact Us!
